project_content.text: I started working on this project because I wanted to try out React Native and play around with native animation.

The big thing that separates talented developers from the rest is their ability to write good looking code, which is easily read and comprehensible. This is why It became my goal for this project to write good code. I used style linter as a guideline.
I created the app with Facebook React Native, which is an easy way to create applications that is compatible with both android and ios.
I used coinmarketcaps api to fetch the most up to date data.
